subject: asking for comments about a doc introducing Junit
msgSnippet: Hello, In order to help developers to begin with Junit, I have written a modest and short documentation based on a simple example. If anyone could critize my
messageBody:
Hello,

In order to help developers to begin with Junit, I have written a
modest and short documentation based on a simple example. If anyone
could critize my doc, I would be very grateful.

Contents :
1. I took some extracts from junit.org to describe Junit
2. Source code of a simple class I want to test
3. source code of TestCase class
4. presentation of Tests results
5. presentation of the open source TestCase generator
(http://sourceforge.net/projects/wttools/)

the doc : http://www.ifrance.fr/rollerjm/pro/Junit.html

Please be indulgent, I am a newbie with Junit and also in english !

Thanx a lot

Jean-Michel

PS : I can not access junit.org since 3 days, is it the same for you ?
